section.title: Remote API helper classes
section.para: JMS API calls to the execution server allow you to manage processes and tasks and retrieve various dynamic information from the execution server. If a JMS request message generates a JMS response message, the response message can be identified by looking for messages that match the JMS correlation ID property of the original JMS request message.
